TopicTitle: BAV and loading performance dropped after 16/04 patch

Articles.Content:
Hello !

I have encountered fps drop in the BAV and big loading time in my save after the 16/04 patch (time played : 112hr, 2 spacestations & 5 ships in flight).

Betwin a new and an old save, with the same ship, i have a difference of over 10fps (<10fps vs 25fps) in the BAV, and loading times for launch are over 5min, the loading bar doesn't show until 3/4min, in the new save <1min.

When i could launch, there is no difference in flight

At a certain point i coudn't launch at all, when i clicked on "LAUNCH" nothing append, i can still modify the ship so the game is not crashed.

spec :

CPU : Ryzen 73800X

RAM : 16Go

GPU : RTX3070

DISK : SSD SAMSUNG 970 EVO 512Go

OS : WIN 11 Pro 22H2 (22621.1555)

Hope this can help improve this amazing game !

Strenth to the devs
